data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niedbała, Wojciech, Ermilov, Sergey G. (2013): Ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from Southern Vietnam with descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 3608 (6): 521-530, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.6.5
